CustomField.formula: IF( DMAPP__Opportunity_Type__c = 'Current', IF( AND( DMAPP__Opportunity__r.CloseDate >= DMAPP__Plan_Unit__r.DMAPP__Account_Plan__r.DMAPP__From_Date__c , DMAPP__Opportunity__r.CloseDate <= DMAPP__Plan_Unit__r.DMAPP__Account_Plan__r.DMAPP__To_Date__c ) , true, false) , false)
CustomField.label: In Scope Current Op
